remarks: If a class' value at an argument is not the empty set, the argument is contained in the domain of the class, and the class restricted to the argument is a function.  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 26-May-2017.)
statement: fvfundmfvn0 $p |- ( ( F ` A ) =/= (/) -> ( A e. dom F /\ Fun ( F |` { A } ) ) ) $.
